src:
Seharian di Kobe, Ini Rekomendasi Wisatanya
06 Nov 2019, 10:07 by titry frilyani



Satu paket kobe beef yang sangat mengenyangkan



Salah satu rumah bergaya Eropa di kawasan Kitano-cho



Mesjid Kobe, mesjid tertua di Jepang dengan dinding bernuansa coklat



Chinatown kota Kobe, ramai dengan restoran dan kedai-kedai



Kobe Motomachi, pusat belanja di kota Kobe


detikTravel Community - Kota Kobe jadi salah satu pilihan destinasi liburan di Jepang. Punya waktu seharian di Kobe, ini rekomendasi wisatanya. Dicatat ya!Dari Osaka, Kobe bisa ditempuh sekitar 30 menit dengan kereta. Ada beberapa hal yang bisa kita lakukan selama satu hari di sini:1. Makan kobe beefYang ini adalah wajib karena Kobe beef dikenal karena kelembutan dagingnya, bercita rasa tinggi yang berpadu dengan lemaknya. Bisa dinikmati sebagai steak, shabu-shabu atau sukiyaki. Namun cara paling enak menikmati Kobe beef adalah di teppanyaki dimana daging langsung dimasak di depan tamunya.Kobe Beef bisa dinikmati di banyak restoran terutama di bagian depan Sannomiya Station. Harganya bervariasi mulai dari 3000 yen atau sekitar 300 ribu rupiah.2. Melihat rumah besar bergaya Eropa di Kitano-choDi sinilah kita bisa merasakan suasana Eropa meskipun sedang berada di Jepang. Dengan rumah-rumah besar dan arsitektur bergaya Eropa, tak disangka kita sedang ada di Jepang.Dikenakan biaya sekitar 550-750 yen untuk bisa masuk ke rumah-rumah yang kini dijadikan museum tersebut. Kawasan ini terletak 10-15 menit jalan kaki dari Sannomiya station.3. Mengunjungi mesjid tertua Jepang, Mesjid KobeMerupakan mesjid tertua di Jepang yang dibangun tahun 1928 dan selesai tahun 1935. Didirikan karena semakin banyaknya muslim yang tinggal di Kobe di tahun 1920-an.Diarsiteki seorang berkebangsaan Ceko, Jan Josef Svagr, mesjid ini bergaya Turki Ismani dengan satu kubah besar dan 2 menara kembar.4. ChinatownTerletak di pusat kota Kobe, dikenal sebagai Nankimachi. Kawasan ini dikenal sebagai lokasi wisata populer sekaligus pusat belanja dan makan. Restoran, kedai makanan menawarkan berbagai macam ramen, roti kukus, juga masakan Cina lainnya. Terletak 5 menit jalan kaki dari Motomachi station.5. Kobe MotomachiMerupakan jalan yang menjadi pusat perbelanjaan Kobe. Terdapat department store kelas atas, juga butik fashion Jepang. Terdapat juga tempat makan mulai dari bistro bergaya Perancis hingga ramen atau yakiniku.
text:
All day in Kobe, Here is the recommended tour
Nov 6 2019, 10:07 by titry frilyani



One package of Kobe beef which is very filling



One of the European-style houses in the Kitano-cho region



Kobe Mosque, the oldest mosque in Japan with brown walls



Kobe's Chinatown, bustling with restaurants and shops



Kobe Motomachi, shopping center in the city of Kobe


detikTravel Community - The city of Kobe is one of the choices of vacation destinations in Japan. Have time all day in Kobe, this is a tour recommendation. Note that from Osaka, Kobe can be reached in about 30 minutes by train. There are several things we can do for one day here: 1. Eating Kobe beef This is mandatory because Kobe beef is known for its tenderness, high taste combined with fat. Can be enjoyed as a steak, shabu-shabu or sukiyaki. But the most delicious way to enjoy Kobe beef is teppanyaki where the meat is cooked directly in front of his guests. Kobe Beef can be enjoyed in many restaurants, especially in front of Sannomiya Station. The price varies starting from 3000 yen or around 300 thousand rupiah.2. Seeing a large European-style house in Kitano-cho This is where we can feel the atmosphere of Europe even though being in Japan. With big houses and European-style architecture, we unexpectedly are in Japan. It costs around 550-750 yen to get into the houses that are now used as museums. This area is located 10-15 minutes walk from Sannomiya station. Visiting Japan's oldest mosque, Kobe Mosque. It is the oldest mosque in Japan which was built in 1928 and completed in 1935. It was established because of the increasing number of Muslims living in Kobe in the 1920s. one large dome and 2 twin towers.4. Chinatown Located in downtown Kobe, known as Nankimachi. This area is known as a popular tourist location as well as a shopping and dining center. Restaurants, food stalls offer a variety of ramen, steamed buns, as well as other Chinese dishes. Located 5 minutes walk from Motomachi station. Kobe Motomachi Is a street that is a shopping center of Kobe. There are upscale department stores, as well as Japanese fashion boutiques. There are also places to eat ranging from French-style bistros to ramen or yakiniku.
